name: ax-reg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
comment: Axiom of Regularity. An axiom of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory. Also called the Axiom of Foundation. A rather non-intuitive axiom that denies more than it asserts, it states (in the form of ~ zfreg ) that every nonempty set contains a set disjoint from itself. One consequence is that it denies the existence of a set containing itself ( ~ elirrv ). A stronger version that works for proper classes is proved as ~ zfregs . (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1993.)
